articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: Drafting controversy at Amstel Gold Race - Vaughters complains, Pogacar explains, director defends - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Van Vliet says 'not true' lead race car gave Pogacar any advantage during race-winning attack
articles.content:
Amstel Gold Race director Leo van Vliet has made a strongly worded denial that the lead organisation car had any effect on the outcome of the Netherlands' biggest Classic on Sunday.

articles.title: Pep Guardiola warns Man City players over chaos at Bayern Munich - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Bayern Munich have suspended a player for punching a teammate and were highly critical of their weekend draw
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola believes that Bayern Munich will be more dangerous opponents for Manchester City for the bizarre problems they have run into over the last week.
